    • Who am I?

    My name is Mariusz, I am also known as Vallode on the internet

    I am a full stack developer, currently working freelance here and there and trying to settle down in a full time position. I enjoy a variety of different hobbies, from DIY woodworking to gardening.

    I work on many different projects at any given time, seeing as I do not have a full time job I try to fill my time with productivity.
